definition: knife, saw and cauldron/ancient instruments of torture/fig. torture

variant of 鋦|锔[ju1]
a saw/to cut with a saw

wok (dialect)/cauldron (old)
sacrificing one's life generously (idiom); to sacrifice oneself fervently to the cause
to be deeply affected/moved to the core
to die by battle-ax (idiom); to be executed
battle-ax and boiling cauldron (idiom); facing torture and execution
people/the masses
person narrow-minded and shortsighted
unyielding

to have a wide knowledge of many subjects (idiom)
overconfident and conceited mannerisms
to rise to action with a determined shake of the arms
(literary) to extort/to take as bribe
